Song.title: God Is So Good
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Daniel Towner and Julia Johnston Public domain

Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 god is so good god is so good god is so good hes so good to me verse 2 he cares for me he cares for me he cares for me hes so good to me verse 3 ill do his will ill do his will ill do his will hes so good to me verse 4 he loves me so he loves me so he loves me so hes so good to me verse 5 he answers prayer he answers prayer he answers prayer hes so good to me
